haReport:
This mission was flown by:
Obltn Friedrich Beethoven, Obltn Friedrich Beethoven
Ltn Patrik Schorner, Ltn Patrik Schorner
Fw Meinhard Frohlich, Fw Meinhard Frohlich
Fw Nikolaus Fechter, Fw Nikolaus Fechter

 The mission was flown from Pukov aerodrome.

Successes include the following: 
On 06/03/1916 near Factory.
A infantry was destroyed by Friedrich Beethoven of FA 15.
Friedrich Beethoven and Rudiger Hoelscher were  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 06/03/1916 near Factory.
A infantry was destroyed by Friedrich Beethoven of FA 15.
Friedrich Beethoven and Rudiger Hoelscher were  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 06/03/1916 near Factory.
A F.E.2b of 8th KAO was brought down by Tobias Platz of FA 15.
DPk Boris Belinsky was killed in action.
Pk Grisha Shubin was killed in action.
Tobias Platz was  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 06/03/1916 near Factory.
A F.E.2b of 3rd KAO was brought down by Marko Kupferblum of FA 15.
Lt Vasily Surnin was killed in action.
Pk Gennadi Shastin was killed in action.
Marko Kupferblum was  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 06/03/1916 near Factory.
A F.E.2b of 3rd KAO was brought down by Sepp Zuber of FA 15.
DPk Grigor Zinchenko was killed in action.
Pk Yaremka Kovrov was killed in action.
Sepp Zuber was  flying a Roland C.IIa.

On 06/03/1916 near Factory.
A Sikorsky S-16 of 4th AOI was brought down by Eberhardt Stockert of FA 15.
Pk Grisha Yeromeyev was killed in action.
Eberhardt Stockert was  flying a Roland C.IIa.


Pilots lost were: 
    Ltn Patrik Schorner: Injured
narrative: An attack on assaulting Russian troops.  I earn my wound badge on this one.  I would ratrher do without.
